name: Tales of Contrast: seasons(demo)
description:
SEASONS and.. MORE!

Red is back and is on a adventure but this time its not saving anyone. Its about seeing how fast you can beat the seasons obstacle course!

IMPORTANT READ

This is a small demo with only the grassland obstacle course finished!

Tip: When touching a checkpoint flag jump on it a couple of times to make sure it saved your spot! Also use a timer to see how fast you can beat this demo! The end of the demo is a the end of the desert which is currently not finished!

V1:

grasslands finished

desert started

base game complete

This game Is a spinoff of tales of contrast made by me kirbystar336 on scratch

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/463805226/
